info.title: OCXP - Open Context Exchange Protocol
info.description:
OCXP provides a unified interface for accessing context across multiple backends.

## Content Types
- **mission** - Mission documents and tracking
- **project** - Project context and files
- **context** - General context information
- **sop** - Standard Operating Procedures
- **repo** - Repository references
- **artifact** - Binary content and artifacts
- **kb** - Knowledge Base queries (Bedrock)
- **docs** - Documentation snapshots

## Authentication
All endpoints require JWT Bearer token from Cognito.

WriteRequestBody.description:
Request body for POST /ocxp/{type}/{id}.

Path parameters (type, id) come from URL, not body.
WriteRequestBody.title: WriteRequestBody

BulkReadRequestBody.description:
Request body for POST /ocxp/{type}/bulk/read.

Path parameter (type) comes from URL, not body.

ids.description: List of content IDs to read (1-100 items)
ids.title: Ids

BulkReadRequestBody.title: BulkReadRequestBody

BulkWriteRequestBody.description:
Request body for POST /ocxp/{type}/bulk/write.

Path parameter (type) comes from URL, not body.

items.description: List of items to write (1-100 items)
items.title: Items

BulkWriteRequestBody.title: BulkWriteRequestBody

BulkDeleteRequestBody.description:
Request body for POST /ocxp/{type}/bulk/delete.

Path parameter (type) comes from URL, not body.

ids.description: List of content IDs to delete (1-100 items)
ids.title: Ids

BulkDeleteRequestBody.title: BulkDeleteRequestBody

RepoDownloadRequest.description:
Request model for repository download operation.

Supports both full repo and docs-only download modes with
configurable file filtering and visibility routing.

path.description: Subdirectory path to filter (e.g., 'src/components'). If set, only files under this path are indexed.
path.title: Path

mode.description: Download mode: full (all files) or docs_only (just documentation)

max_file_size_kb.description: Maximum file size in KB to process
max_file_size_kb.title: Max File Size Kb

trigger_vectorization.description: Trigger Bedrock KB sync after upload
trigger_vectorization.title: Trigger Vectorization

RepoDownloadRequest.title: RepoDownloadRequest

RepoStatusRequest.description: Request model for checking repo download status.
RepoStatusRequest.title: RepoStatusRequest

RepoListRequest.description: Request model for listing downloaded repos.
RepoListRequest.title: RepoListRequest

GitHubCheckAccessRequest.description:
Request to check repository access.

Used to verify if the user can access a repository
before attempting to download it.

github_token.description: Personal Access Token for private repos
github_token.title: Github Token

GitHubCheckAccessRequest.title: GitHubCheckAccessRequest

error.description: Error type: not_found, invalid_token, access_denied, rate_limited, unknown
error.title: Error

GitHubListBranchesRequest.description:
Request to list repository branches.

Used to populate branch dropdown in the UI.

github_token.description: Personal Access Token for private repos
github_token.title: Github Token

GitHubListBranchesRequest.title: GitHubListBranchesRequest

GitHubGetContentsRequest.description:
Request to get repository contents.

Used to browse repository files and folders.

github_token.description: Personal Access Token for private repos
github_token.title: Github Token

GitHubGetContentsRequest.title: GitHubGetContentsRequest
